short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: low-radical is an open source browser extension that shuts down GAFAM.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension blocks all websites from GAFAM. 

Websites owned by GAFAM are also blocked (eg: Audible, Twitch for Amazon).

Main websites blocked:

Google
  - google.*
  - *.google
  - youtube.com
  - google-analytics.com
  - blogger.com
  - and more https://github.com/lowwebtech/low-radical/blob/master/src/scripts/data/urls/google.js

Amazon
  - amazon.*
  - *.amazon
  - audible.*
  - abebooks.com
  - primevideo.com
  - twitch.tv
  - wholefoodsmarket.com
  - imdb.com
  - blueorigin.com
  - washingtonpost.com
  - and more https://github.com/lowwebtech/low-radical/blob/master/src/scripts/data/urls/amazon.js

Facebook
  - facebook.*
  - *.facebook
  - instagram.com
  - whatsapp.com
  - messenger.com
  - and more https://github.com/lowwebtech/low-radical/blob/master/src/scripts/data/urls/facebook.js

Apple
  - apple.*
  - *.apple
  - beatsbydre.com
  - and more https://github.com/lowwebtech/low-radical/blob/master/src/scripts/data/urls/apple.js

Microsoft
  - microsoft.*
  - *.microsoft
  - bing.com
  - xbox.com
  - github.com
  - linkedin.com
  - skype.com
  - msn.com
  - and more https://github.com/lowwebtech/low-radical/blob/master/src/scripts/data/urls/microsoft.js
